GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: returns all articles, by default in descending order by created date, queries can be made to return articles by topic

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article by the id entered

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments for article by article id entered, default sorted most recent comments first

comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment for an article by article id entered, returns the new inserted comment

comment.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates vote count on article by article id and votes entered, if no current votes then new votes will be added, returns updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by the comment id passed in, responds with 204 status and no content to client

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
